name: Mahjong Forest Journey
description:
The best Mahjong game! Beautiful, Fun and Challenging!

Chipmunk Rolly lost precious acorns and is in despair. Go on an adventure with Rolly and help to find them!

HOW TO PLAY
• Match all the tiles to complete a board!
• Save baby birds stuck between tiles!
• Collect shining gold acorn tiles!

FEATURES
• Enjoy 180+ fascinating layouts.
• Easy to play, gets challenging as you level up.
• Use great boosters in a difficult situation and get over it.
• Collect various and unique collection items from each chapter.
• Customize cute character with wonderful outfits!
• Amazing and beautiful graphics and sound effects.


NOTES
• Mahjong Forest Journey contains the ads like banner, interstitial, video and house ads.
• Mahjong Forest Journey is free to play, but you can purchase In-app items like AD FREE.

E-MAIL

Like us on FACEBOOK

Have fun with Mahjong Forest Journey!
Thank you!
